<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Second Ally](/Feats.aspx?ID=235) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 113 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[divine ally](/Classes.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

Your inner grace attracts the attention of a second protective spirit. Choose a second type of divine ally and gain its benefits.
name: Second Ally
